author: CMS Medios
title: Mujer estrella tesla de 2 mdp contra negocio tras manejar en estado de ebriedad | Noticias de México | EL IMPARCIAL
text: Mujer estrella tesla de 2 mdp contra negocio tras manejar en estado de ebriedad El choque de un Tesla Modelo X en un local de Ciudad de México dejó daños en la fachada de un negocio Ciudad de México.- Una mujer aparentemente ebria chocó un Tesla Modelo X en un local en Ciudad de México, causando daños significativos. Aunque prometió pagar por los daños, ni ella ni su vehículo fueron llevados a la Fiscalía, manteniendo su identidad en secreto. DESTROZA AUTO de 2.6 MILLONES… y SE VA SIN PAGAR Así estrelló esta mujer un [@Tesla]en [@AlcaldiaAO] Los dueños de ese negocio aseguran q iba borracha. Aunq una aseguradora se comprometió a pagarle, no lo han hecho. Y a la [@FiscaliaCDMX]nunca llegó nada. El caso [#C4EnAlerta] [pic.twitter.com/VsIEr4O7SQ]— Carlos Jiménez (@c4jimenez) [December 28, 2023] El dueño del local afirmó que la conductora iba manejando con exceso de velocidad y en estado de ebriedad, sin embargo, los dejó ir tras asegurarle que iban a cubrir el costo total de los daños, frente a los ajustadores de la aseguradora Quálitas y policías que llegaron luego del incidente. Sin embargo, cinco días después, nadie ha contactado al dueño del local para pagar los daños, que incluyen daños en la estructura, fachada y aparatos como refrigeradores. Te puede interesar: [Choque múltiple por densa niebla en una autopista de Turquía deja al menos 10 muertos y 57 heridos](https://www.elimparcial.com/mundo/Choque-multiple-por-densa-niebla-en-una-autopista-de-Turquia-deja-al-menos-10-muertos-y-57-heridos-20231228-0073.html) Aunque los dueños del Tesla aseguraron que cubrirían los costos, aún no se ha concretado ningún pago y el propietario afectado sigue sin noticias sobre cómo se resolverá el asunto.

author: Kristhel Benavides Lara
title: Raphael recibe el título Honoris Causa por la Universidad de Jaén
text:
Raphael recibe el título Honoris Causa por la Universidad de Jaén
El evento se celebró en la ciudad de Jaén, España, donde se le condecoró por sus más de 60 años de exitosa carrera artística
La Universidad de Jaén, en España, ha otorgado el título de Doctor Honoris Causa al cantante Raphael (81), en reconocimiento a su extraordinaria trayectoria de más de seis décadas en la industria musical. El acto, reunió a destacadas figuras del ámbito político, académico y cultural, quienes rindieron homenaje al artista.
Spotify Wrapped: ¿Qué escuchan los famosos ecuatorianos?
Leer más
Durante su discurso, Raphael se mostró profundamente agradecido por el reconocimiento y destacó el papel fundamental que ha tenido su voz a lo largo de su carrera. “En la música, como en la vida, lo esencial no es la perfección, sino la verdad”, afirmó.
El cantante nacido en Linares (Jaén) definió la interpretación musical como un ejercicio de autenticidad y emoción. “Cantar es, en muchos sentidos, actuar, ponerse en la piel del otro y arrastrar al oyente en un viaje emocional”, aseguró.
El intérprete, quien es conocido a nivel mundial por su amplio rango vocal y su presencia escénica, subrayó que su éxito ha sido fruto de mantenerse fiel a sí mismo y resistir modas pasajeras. “Nunca me ha interesado ser simplemente un cantante que suena bien. Siempre he buscado ser un intérprete que conmueve y despierta sentimientos”, expresó el artista, quien dedicó el doctorado a quienes encuentran en la interpretación una forma de dar sentido a sus vidas.
El rector de la UJA, Nicolás Ruiz, calificó la jornada como “un día histórico” para la universidad y la provincia de Jaén. “Raphael no solo engrandece nuestro claustro de doctores, sino que también ha sido y será el mejor embajador de esta tierra”, afirmó Ruiz, quien destacó los valores de humildad, fuerza y pasión del artista.
Los logros de Raphael
María José Silva quiere que los niños tengan una Navidad diferente
https://www.expreso.ec/ocio/maria-jose-silva-quiere-ninos-tengan-navidad-diferente-223267.html
Este reconocimiento se junta los más de 120 que ha recibido a lo largo de 55 años carrera. Raphael es uno de los artistas más importantes de la música en español, ha cosechado a lo largo de su extensa carrera artística una impresionante cantidad de premios.
Con más de 350 discos de oro y 50 de platino, su legado musical sigue vivo. Ha sido nominado a los Premios Grammy y ha sido reconocido por su sobresaliente trayectoria con el título de Excelentísimo Señor Comendador de Isabel la Católica, otorgado por el Rey Juan Carlos I de España. Además, ha sido honrado como Hijo Predilecto en países como México, Colombia, Ecuador, Chile, Argentina, Venezuela y Perú, destacando su impacto global.
El cantante, que aún sigue siendo aclamado tanto en España como en América, cuenta con un museo en Linares, su ciudad natal, donde exhibe una colección de sus históricos premios desde la década de los 60. A lo largo de su carrera, Raphael ha continuado recibiendo homenajes y premios en reconocimiento a su contribución a la música.
¿Quieres acceder a todo el contenido de calidad sin límites? ¡SUSCRÍBETE AQUÍ!

author: penta
title: How to Extend the Lifespan of Your HVAC System with Preventative Care
text:
Your HVAC system plays a crucial role in maintaining indoor comfort throughout the year. Whether heating in the winter or cooling in the summer, this system works hard to regulate temperature and air quality. However, without proper maintenance, HVAC units can wear down prematurely, leading to costly repairs and replacements. Implementing a strategic preventative care routine ensures longevity, efficiency, and consistent performance.
The Importance of Preventative Maintenance Many homeowners tend to overlook HVAC maintenance until problems arise. Unfortunately, waiting for an issue to develop often leads to increased expenses and reduced efficiency. Regular upkeep offers numerous benefits, including:
Improved Energy Efficiency: A well-maintained system consumes less energy, reducing monthly utility bills. Extended Equipment Lifespan: Proper care prevents premature wear and tear, ensuring your HVAC system lasts longer. Better Indoor Air Quality: Clean filters and ductwork reduce allergens, dust, and pollutants, improving overall air quality. Fewer Repairs: Identifying minor issues early prevents major breakdowns and expensive repairs. Key Preventative Maintenance Steps for HVAC Longevity 1. Change or Clean Air Filters Regularly Clogged air filters restrict airflow, forcing the system to work harder. This strain not only increases energy consumption but also leads to premature system failure. Homeowners should replace or clean filters every 1-3 months, depending on usage and indoor air quality.
2. Schedule Professional HVAC Inspections Routine inspections by trained HVAC professionals , such as those from Climate Systems Air Conditioning & Heating, help identify potential issues before they become major problems. These inspections typically involve checking for:
Refrigerant levels and leaks Electrical connections and components Thermostat calibration Proper airflow and ductwork conditions 3. Keep the Outdoor Unit Clean and Unobstructed The exterior HVAC unit needs proper airflow to function efficiently. Regularly clearing away dirt, leaves, and debris ensures optimal performance. Homeowners should:
Trim plants or bushes at least two feet away from the unit Remove accumulated debris such as grass clippings and fallen leaves Check for signs of rust or wear on the unit housing 4. Maintain Proper Thermostat Settings Efficient thermostat settings help reduce unnecessary strain on the HVAC system. Consider upgrading to a programmable or smart thermostat to automate temperature control. Setting the thermostat to energy-saving temperatures when away from home can lower energy bills and extend system lifespan.
5. Inspect and Clean Air Ducts Over time, dust and debris accumulate inside ductwork, restricting airflow and reducing efficiency. Having air ducts cleaned every few years prevents buildup, improving airflow and indoor air quality. Homeowners should also inspect for:
Leaks or disconnected sections Signs of mold or mildew Obstructions such as rodent nests or heavy dust buildup 6. Lubricate Moving Parts HVAC systems rely on multiple mechanical components to operate. Friction in motors and fans can cause excessive wear and tear, reducing efficiency. Regular lubrication of moving parts helps prevent early failure and ensures smooth operation.
7. Monitor and Maintain Refrigerant Levels Proper refrigerant levels are critical for effective cooling. Low levels can indicate a leak or inefficient operation. A professional HVAC technician should check refrigerant levels during regular maintenance visits and address any leaks promptly.
8. Ensure Proper Insulation Around HVAC Components Good insulation minimizes heat loss and ensures the HVAC system does not overwork itself. Properly sealed windows, insulated ductwork, and well-maintained weatherstripping around doors and vents contribute to better efficiency.
9. Test and Maintain Carbon Monoxide Detectors For homes using gas-powered heating systems, carbon monoxide (CO) leaks pose a serious health hazard. Homeowners should:
Install CO detectors near HVAC systems and sleeping areas Replace batteries annually Test alarms monthly 10. Consider an Annual HVAC Service Plan Signing up for an annual maintenance plan with a trusted HVAC provider, such as Climate Systems Air Conditioning & Heating, ensures routine upkeep is never neglected. These service plans typically cover seasonal inspections, cleaning, and tune-ups, offering peace of mind and cost savings over time.
Common HVAC Problems Prevented by Regular Maintenance Routine care can prevent many common HVAC issues, including:
Frozen Evaporator Coils: Often caused by dirty air filters or low refrigerant levels, leading to reduced cooling efficiency. Short Cycling: The system turning on and off frequently due to clogged filters or thermostat issues. Uneven Heating or Cooling: Blocked vents, dirty ducts, or improper system sizing may cause temperature inconsistencies. Excessive Noise: Loose components, failing motors, or debris buildup can create unusual sounds. Water Leaks: Clogged condensate drain lines or failing pumps can lead to leaks and potential water damage. How Preventative Maintenance Saves Money Preventative maintenance isn’t just about system longevity—it also leads to significant financial savings. A well-maintained HVAC system operates more efficiently, reducing energy costs. Additionally, proactive maintenance prevents costly emergency repairs and early replacements, saving homeowners thousands over time.
When to Consider HVAC Replacement Even with meticulous maintenance, HVAC systems eventually reach the end of their lifespan. Signs that indicate it may be time for a replacement include:
Age of the System: Most units last between 10-15 years before becoming less efficient. Frequent Repairs: If repair costs add up to more than half the price of a new system, replacement is the better investment. Declining Performance: If temperature regulation becomes inconsistent, the system may no longer be operating at peak efficiency. Rising Energy Bills: Older units require more energy to function, increasing utility expenses. Final Thoughts Extending the lifespan of an HVAC system requires a proactive approach to maintenance. From changing filters and cleaning ducts to scheduling professional inspections, small efforts lead to significant long-term benefits. Climate Systems Air Conditioning & Heating provides expert maintenance services that help homeowners maximize efficiency, reduce energy costs, and extend the longevity of their heating and cooling systems. By committing to routine care, homeowners can enjoy a comfortable indoor environment while avoiding unnecessary repairs and replacements.

author: Gary Huaman
title: Canal confirmado Inter Miami vs América de México: así podrás ver a Lionel Messi en Las Vegas
text:
Canal confirmado Inter Miami vs América de México: así podrás ver a Lionel Messi en Las Vegas
Las garzas afrontarán su primer amistoso internacional como preparación para el arranque de la temporada 2025 de la MLS.
Arranca la pretemporada del Inter Miami. Luego de unas largas vacaciones, el equipo de Lionel Messi, Luis Suárez, Sergio Busquets y Jordi Alba se vienen preparando para el arranque de la Major League Soccer (MLS), por lo que pactaron cinco amistosos internacionales, entre los que destacan Universitario de Deportes en Perú. Por lo pronto, las garzas se medirán ante el Club América de México en Las Vegas.
Tras la salida de Gerardo Martino, los rosados contrataron a Javier Mascherano como su nuevo entrenador. El 'Jefecito' dejó el cargo de DT de la sub-20 de Argentina y asumirá, por primera vez en su carrera, un equipo de fútbol. En lo que respecta al plantel, Inter Miami han anunciado varias salidas, como por ejemplo las de Matías Rojas, Leonardo Campana, CJ Dos Santos, Diego Gómez, Nicolás Freire, entre otros; pero también anunció la contratación de Fafa Picault, Tadeo Allende y Gonzalo Luján.
PUEDES VER:
[Jean Ferrari aseguró que Messi solicitó jugar contra Universitario: "Hay un pedido del mismo Lionel"]
En la previa del partido ante el Club América de México, el 'Jefecito' fue consultado sobre si Lionel Messi sumaría minutos en Las Vegas y señaló que la presencia de la 'Pulga' está en veremos, pues apenas llevan dos días de trabajo y necesita administrar la carga en todos sus dirigidos.
"Eso lo tenemos que ver, apenas llevamos dos días de trabajo. El objetivo es poner a punto a todos los jugadores física y técnicamente para cuando empiece la competición oficial", empezó declarando el DT del Inter Miami en conferencia de prensa y agregó: "Obviamente que tenemos varios partidos de pretemporada que nos van a permitir competir, pero el tema de los minutos lo veremos viendo de acuerdo a la sensación que tengas ellos".
Banner oficial del amistoso internacional. Foto: Club América
¿Cuándo y a qué hora juegan Inter Miami vs América?
El amistoso internacional entre Inter Miami vs América se llevará a cabo este sábado 18 de enero a partir de las 10.00 p. m. (hora peruana) y 9.00 p. m. (hora mexicana).
¿Qué canal transmitirá el Inter Miami vs América?
De momento no hay un canal confirmado que transmitirá el Inter Miami vs América, pero la plataforma que se encargará de transmitir todas las incidencias será ViX.
¿Dónde van a jugar Inter Miami vs América?
El choque entre Inter Miami vs América se llevará a cabo en el Allegiant Stadium, recinto deportivo ubicado en la ciudad de Paradise, Nevada, Estados Unidos y que tiene una capacidad para 65,000 espectadores.
¿Cuánto cuestan las entradas para el Inter Miami vs América?
- 93 dólares – 1,920 pesos mexicanos
- 100 dólares – 2,064 pesos mexicanos
- 125 dólares – 2,581 pesos mexicanos
- 175 dólares – 3,613 pesos mexicanos
- 200 dólares – 4,128 pesos mexicanos
- 250 dólares – 5,162 pesos mexicanos
- 350 dólares – 7,227 pesos mexicanos
- 525 dólares – 10,840 pesos mexicanos
- 625 dólares – 12,905 pesos mexicanos
- 800 dólares – 16,519 pesos mexicanos.
Calendario de Inter Miami previo a la MLS 2025
- Sábado 18 de enero (10 p. m., hora del Este/7 p. m., hora del Pacífico) | Club América | Allegiant Stadium | Las Vegas, Nevada, Estados Unidos
- Miércoles 29 de enero (8 pm ET y hora local de Perú) | Club Universitario de Deportes | Estadio Monumental | Lima, Perú
- Domingo 2 de febrero (5 pm ET y hora local de Panamá) | Deportivo San Miguelito | Estadio Rommel Fernández Gutiérrez | Ciudad de Panamá, Panamá
- Sábado 8 de febrero (8 pm ET/7 pm hora local de Honduras) | Club Deportivo Olimpia | Estadio Olímpico Metropolitano | San Pedro Sula, Honduras
- Viernes 14 de febrero (19:30 h, hora del Este de EE. UU.) | Orlando City SC | Estadio Raymond James | Tampa, Florida, Estados Unidos

author: ANI
title: India News | Dharmendra Pradhan Inaugurates ICSSR Research Internship Programme in Social and Human Sciences
text:
New Delhi [India], December 6 (ANI): Union Minister for Education, Dharmendra Pradhan, inaugurated the Indian Council of Social Science Research (ICSSR) Research Internship Programme in Social and Human Sciences in New Delhi on Thursday.
He also distributed appointment letters to the ICSSR Research Interns. Pradhan also distributed prizes to the winners of the National Argumentative Essay Writing Competition on "Simultaneous Elections in India: One Nation, One Election" to the UG, PG and Doctoral Students, said a press release from the Ministry of Education.
Also Read | Delhi Air Pollution: Rahul Gandhi Assures Citizens' Delegation To Take Up Air Pollution Issue in Parliament.
Pradhan, while speaking at the occasion, said that the internship presents a unique opportunity to postgraduate students of social sciences and will strengthen social science research, which is pivotal to achieving social progress, embracing technological disruptions and driving economic growth and aligning to the national objective of Viksit Bharat. He further said that the nature of jobs is changing rapidly with technologies like AI driving this change, and research in the area of social sciences will play a pivotal role in ensuring that technological disruptions aid social development.
Pradhan also said that the National Education Policy 2020 has recognized the need for quality social science research, which plays a pivotal role in shaping societies. ICSSR internship programme is yet another step towards fostering individual growth and creating a pool of skilled researchers who can contribute to areas like policy research, data analysis, and social innovation, he said.
Also Read | APPSC Exams 2024 Dates: Andhra Pradesh Public Service Commission Announces Schedule for Various Exams, Check Details.
The Minister said that India is a living ancient civilization, which has embraced modernity while retaining its basic character. He added that robust social science research plays an important role in ensuring civilizational sustenance and growth and expressed confidence that this initiative will strengthen the civilizational ethos of Bharatiyata and pave the way for the future.
With the introduction of the NEP 2020, there is an increased focus on internships which is being used to award credits to students pursuing undergraduate (UG) and postgraduate (PG) programmes through the National Credit Framework (NCrF). ICSSR internship program is yet another step towards fostering individual growth and creating a pool of skilled researchers who can contribute to areas like policy research, data analysis, and social innovation, said the release.
The Internship Programme at ICSSR has been designed with a fundamental objective to match education with research skills to prepare young social scientists and a humanist for the changing dynamics of employability and ensure their meaningful contribution towards national development. The uniqueness of the Internship Programme is the integration of modern education and skills with traditional knowledge and techniques.
Taking inspiration from the vision of Prime Minister Narendra Modi that Anusandhan is a critical component of Bharat's development and that "skill development and employment are essential needs in India," ICSSR has embarked on this mission to provide essential skills to the youth for conducting quality research in Social and Human Sciences. This internship focuses on bridging the gap between academic knowledge and employability skills. It aims to foster research skills, including ideation, data collection, experimentation, and report presentation, the release mentioned.
Interns shall gain hands-on experience in research tools, methodologies, and real-world applications by working with experienced and successful mentors from universities, research think tanks, industry and community.
The programme aims to be multidisciplinary, with the selected candidates representing different domains of social and human sciences such as Statistics, Population Studies, Sociology, Applied Psychology, Public Health and Policy, International Relations, Development Studies, Language Studies, Anthropology etc.
The advertisement for the Research Internship Programme received a very positive response with more than 3600 applications. After following a rigorous selection process and ensuring inclusivity, ICSSR has selected 40 candidates from different parts of the nation to be appointed as interns.
The Internship Programme would involve national and international workshops on skills required for research studies on the 17 Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) of the UN firmly reiterated and newly contextualised by Bharat in the highly successful G-20 presidency declaration. (ANI)
(This is an unedited and auto-generated story from Syndicated News feed, LatestLY Staff may not have modified or edited the content body)

author: Chintan Devgania
title: NASCAR Fans Insinuate Kyle Buschâ€™s Fallout With RCR After Rowdyâ€™s Inability to Outshine Denny Hamlin Triggers His Fury
text:
NASCAR’s two favorite villains,
Kyle Busch and Denny Hamlin, were trading blows during the final few laps of the Brickyard 400 last Sunday. Given Rowdy’s miserable run this season, he was slated for a solid finish, but it all came to a crashing end after wrecking with Denny Hamlin.
At the time, Kyle Busch was running 6th, just behind the No. 11 car of Hamlin. Having made up track position, the RCR star found it hard to make a pass on his former teammate for a potential top-five finish. After multiple attempts, he lost his patience and decided to send it all in on Turn 1, taking the inside lane.
It was a risky move as
Denny Hamlin lifted to make an entry going into the corner. But Rowdy, having missed his markers and coming in too fast, eventually collided with the #11 Toyota Camry. The next thing you know, he ended up wrecking himself on the safer barriers. This was a case of him trying to bite more than he could chew, which wasn’t the first we saw from him this season.
ADVERTISEMENT
Article continues below this ad
Given that a good points day has been a rarity for the #8 team, a top 10 position could’ve been a good result going into the Olympics break. However, they had to settle for a P28 finish because of their driver’s questionable move late in the race. It’s fair to say the driver-team relationship hasn’t been the best in 2024, and perhaps this incident further highlighted those cracks.
Kyle Busch during the final laps @ Indianapolis, 2024.
[pic.twitter.com/UL2QSV3rvj]
— Andrew (@Basso488)
[July 24, 2024]
A video clip of Kyle Busch trying to make a pass on Hamlin has been doing rounds online. The instructions given to Rowdy were clear: to finish the race on a good note. However, the driver had other ideas, which has allowed fans to share their take on the predicament Rowdy finds himself in.
Is everything alright between Kyle Busch and Richard Childress Racing?
Coming into the Brickyard 400 race, in his previous nine starts, he only had a single top-10 finish. There was potential for a top 10 or even a top 5 finish had he stayed away from chaos and drama. According to this fan, he shot himself in the foot with a low-percentage move. “He just has so many bad finishes, so he tries to get higher finishes when he’s already 6th and starts to overcomplicate, eventually leading to something like this.”
“I know you’re annoyed but it’s still a good day, big picture.” This was the message Busch received on the radio after he couldn’t find a way to pass Hamlin. But he certainly didn’t follow the instructions and eventually wrecked himself. Fans couldn’t understand why the driver made that call, knowing that he had a good points day. “Tells him we need to finish, he wrecks the car, then acts like he always does when asked about fixing it, and swerves at Hamlin after he’s wrecked hard. The man has never changed one bit.”
ADVERTISEMENT
Article continues below this ad
Looking at the clip, it was evident that the #11 Camry was just good at entering the corner and making a clean exit. Busch wasn’t able to match the speed or the lap time set by Hamlin. It was indeed a questionable call on his part to proceed with that aggressive move, knowing that his rival would respond with defensive blocks. Making a mockery of Rowdy’s racecraft, this fan replied, “bro tried the same move over and over and was mad it didn’t work? Lmao.”
Either his crew chief, Randall Burnett, or a crew member completely lost their cool seeing Busch throw away a potentially good result. “I just f***ing said, we need a good finish” was the message heard on the team radio. Reading between the lines and suspecting tension within the No. 8 team, a fan shared an interesting take on the situation. “The crew doesn’t sound happy with him. Maybe he is on his way out.”
It has to be noted that this was a late-race wreck. And had Busch kept his hands clean, Brad Keselowski might have pulled off the biggest fuel-mileage race in recent history. Frustrated by seeing their favorite driver’s hopes of a win being washed away by a silly caution, this fan wrote, “I lost a keselowski win for that?”
ADVERTISEMENT
Article continues below this ad
Kevin Harvick didn’t mince words in calling out Kyle Busch’s desperate attempt, stating, “Kyle is driving way over his head.” Even Rowdy’s ardent supporters are puzzled to see him resorting to such tactics on days when he could have a positive outcome. “I know RCR is struggling but what in the world is going on with KB. It almost seems like he’s doing this on purpose. Otherwise none of this makes any sense. I sure hope he can right the ship after the break. Nascar is better with KB winning races.”
In the aftermath of the race, Busch reflected on his muck-up and apologized to his entire team via his social media handle. However, with just four races to go in the regular season, it’s just hard to see him miraculously make a comeback.

author: andrijab@diplomacy.edu
title: Blackwell AI chip rollout fuels Nvidia's revenue surge | Digital Watch Observatory
text:
Blackwell AI chip rollout fuels Nvidia’s revenue surge
Surging Blackwell chip orders ease concerns about a slowdown in AI demand, strengthening Nvidia’s growth outlook.
Nvidia has forecast strong growth for the first quarter, reinforcing confidence in the booming demand for AI chips. Orders for the company’s new Blackwell semiconductors were described as ‘amazing’, with CEO Jensen Huang stating that AI is advancing rapidly.
Investors had raised concerns last month after Chinese startup DeepSeek claimed to have developed cost-efficient AI models, but Nvidia’s results eased doubts.
Analysts had expressed scepticism about the transition to Blackwell and competition from DeepSeek, but the latest figures reassured investors.
Margins remain under pressure, with Nvidia forecasting a slight drop to 71% in the first quarter, below Wall Street estimates. Chief Financial Officer Colette Kress expects a recovery later in the year as production scales up and costs decline.
Despite some concerns about oversupply in AI infrastructure, Chinese firms have reportedly increased orders for Nvidia’s H20 AI chip, further supporting demand.
Nvidia’s fourth-quarter revenue rose 78% to $39.3 billion, surpassing expectations. Data centre sales surged 93% to $35.6 billion, continuing strong growth from the previous quarter.
Investors remain focused on Nvidia’s ability to maintain momentum in a competitive AI landscape, particularly as tech giants like Microsoft and Meta commit substantial investments to AI expansion.
For more information on these topics, visit diplomacy.edu.
